channel.title: Courtesy of I Am Noob: Goz's GUI[Beta]
channel.description:
[url=http://javaisthebest.com/forums/index.php?topic=1720.0]Here[/url] and [url=http://www.rune-server.org/showthread.php?t=29992]Here[/url] [quote="Goz"][center][b][u]Download Link:[/u][/b] [url=http://www.lukesrealm.co.uk/GUI.zip]Here[/url]
[b][u]Pictures:[/u][/b] [img]http://www.lukesrealm.co.uk/5.bmp[/img] All buttons work!
[move]Comment please - 100% me![/move][/center][/quote]
I Am Noob asked me to post this so dont flame me!
~ Killah

item.title: Courtesy of I Am Noob: Goz's GUI[Beta]
item.dc:creator: @pizza_pie pizza pie
item.description:
@pizza_pie wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:11, topic:143890”][quote author=r4ndom1 link=topic=197343.msg1771021#msg1771021 date=1190411640]

People are attracted to buttons… its only natural.

no, 12 year olds are

Damned 12 year olds.

since when did age ever mean anything on the internet. Apart from people getting rep for playing runescape when they should be getting there silver surfer badges instead.
[/quote]

Younger people tend to be lazy and expect everyone else to do stuff for them.[/quote]
AHAHAHAHAH ahahahaah ahahahahahaahha ahahahhaahahahaha, omg, yea, right on.

But this is getting a little off topic

Read full topic

item.title: Courtesy of I Am Noob: Goz's GUI[Beta]
item.dc:creator: @pizza_pie pizza pie
item.description:
@pizza_pie wrote:

[quote=“lawl, post:1, topic:144357”][quote author=pizza pie link=topic=197343.msg1762937#msg1762937 date=1190027628]
People are attracted to buttons… its only natural.
[/quote]
no, 12 year olds are[/quote]
NOUR

Rofl, jk.

But on a serious note, please just make something useful.

EDIT: for the people who dont know the meaning of useful, keep reading:

Don’t just make something with no sense of design. Did you notice all programmers, even if it were a mouse, would not just make a GUI with buttons randomly everywhere. Try at least taking those buttons, putting in tabs by categories. Then, maybe you should make something that opens a site when you type a URL and press enter. Or googles it and shows the results on a JEditorPane.

HAVE FUN!

Read full topic
